\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{booktabs}
\usepackage[dvips,vlines]{tabularht}

\begin{document}

\begin{tabularht}{spread=0pt}{|l|l|}
  \hline
  First&Line\\%
  \hline
\interrowstart
  \addlinespace[10mm]%
\interrowstop
  \hline
  Second&Line\\%
\interrowstart
  \hline
  \hline
\interrowstop
  Third&Line\\%
  \hline
\interrowspace{10mm}
  \hline
  Fourth&Line\\%
  \hline
\end{tabularht}

\end{document}
\endinput
